ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Overthere to Oasis
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I chose to worship Erollisi Marr.  I roleplay very well.  I also think it s disgusting that the Flowers in EJ (Erollisi something or other) will
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I chose to worship Erollisi Marr. I roleplay very well. I also
think it's disgusting that the Flowers in EJ (Erollisi something or other)
will attack me on sight even though I've never once done anything to incur
any kind of faction hit that would cause my goddess to go after me.

I also find it disturbing that a plant (of all things) that was named for
the godess of love, gimme a break, would be aggressive??? Whassup with
that?

If they're willing to do something like that I really think I would rather
not see any deity restricted items. Who knows. I might find a sword of
erollisi that does 20dmg/20dly to it's wielder.

hehe all joking asside I'm not against it. But I would really rather they
not try to implement any more "new" things until they fix the plethora of
broken things in the game.

I would LOVE to see all the pathing issues that make certain dungeons
unplayable fixed. I'd love to see all the broken quests fixed. I'd DEARLY
love to see the current zones upgraded to kunark graphics (but they can't do
that :()

At any rate. I don't mind the idea. I'd just like to see the currenly
broken stuff get fixed before they implement anything else "new". We have
enough problems. The last thing I need is to get killed walking into a bard
guild because they somehow screwed up god factions.

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 26, 2000 4:47 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Overthere to Oasis


> Some of us were actually hoping to see some deity related items that
aren't
> Innouruk specific. I would think a fair number of bards actually chose a
> deity for reasons other than convenience. Well, one can hope anyhow.
>
> Kit
>
> hehehe SHH don't remind em ;)
>
> > IIRC, Verant stated before Kunark was released that some of the new
magic
> > items that would be found in Kunark would be deity specific. Guess they
> > decided not to implement the idea.
> >
> > Galtin of E'ci
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]

> > To: eqbards@egroups.com

> taken
> > a
> > > VentrilSavil faction hit, you should be fine.
> >
> > Can anyone tell me if there is any advantage to being anything other
than

> > picked one of the Marrs back in April '99, and it's pretty annoying that
> > both the Mask of Deception and
> > the Iksar Hide Mask are, essentially, utterly worthless as a
consequence.
> > I'm a Half Elf, I don't need
> > the vision stuff.
> >
> > Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk
